website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an affordable retinol cream with a nice consistency, generous supply, and lots of satisfied, repeat customers, this is an unbeatable deal.
pros: This cream's smooth formula earns praise for not feeling sticky or greasy, and absorbing quickly
cons: The pump has the tendency to jam or quit working altogether

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: holy crap this stuff is GREAT. i had chemo in 2006 and my neck has had crepe skin since. looked like those new adhesive stretchy bands they use to hold gause on after taking your blood. I've been good about using this once a day and today i took a close look with my 5X makeup mirror. my neck is SMOOTH. seldom doed a product deliver axactly what it says. this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Q

customer_reviews.title: Better than Neutrogena
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I could see a definite improvement in fine lines and sun spots on my face in just one week. I am 70 years old and use it on my face, neck, arms and hands for softening as a deterrent against skin tears as I have spent much time outside. Has previously been using Neutrogena Intense Wrinkle Repair with good results, but Advanced Clinical Retinol works even better at a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: The Advanced Clinicals Retinol Cream is an amazing product. After rinsing my face with cold water and drying, I apply it twice daily, morning and evening. First of all, after applying, your face feels clean and fresh with a cooling/firming sensation. After two weeks of use I have noticed fine lines disappearing along with a firmer/moist tone to my skin. Now that I have discovered this product, there is no need for other products. Furthermore, during shipment, the cap came off one of the two 16 oz containers, spilling most of the contents of one container. After I notified Pure Valley of the issue, they apologized and were prompt in sending me a new replacement. Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 52 and am using this on my face and body once a day. It has taken 10-14 days of use for me to notice that my skin is a lot more hydrated and areas are beginning to firm up. I will continue to use this product. Fantastic Price! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cole

customer_reviews.title: Really Works,not a filler.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first cream I have used that has Retinol in it.I put all over,and mostly on arms and some on face. I can see it working,diminishing forearm sun damage by signaling skin to start new cell growth.wrinkles start to get wider as the gap is getting new cell growth. This cream is not a puff up or temporary filler.
customer_reviews.author: jjjohn

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed by how great this cream works
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed by how great this cream works. I have very sensitive skin and was worried about trying something new but this one feels great. Did not break out at all. I feel like my skin look younger and I have less deep wrinkles over all. This is also a huge amount of cream. I think it is the best deal you can get on a retinol cream and it works !!! Best money spent in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes a cream that works and is affordable❤️👠
customer_reviews.text: I’m 57 years old and this cream took away forehead wrinkles & eye squint wrinkles ...I love it and use it every night ...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be tightening and toning my legs
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my legs daily with a fascia blaster and massage oil to help reduce appearance of cellulite. So far, it's helping! Of course nothing is a miracle but I do see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Pike On A Bike

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only posted one other review in my entire life. I had to write a review on this product. THIS IS THE BEST TREATMENT/MOISTURIZER EVER. I have only had it for one week and I see the difference already. It doesn't irritate my rosacea. It instantly feels like its working the second you put it on. No scent at all. And, it's so inexpensive!!! I will continue to purchase it forever. No need for my oil of Olay or eucerin. They're going in the trash.6 out of 5 stars!!!! Buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite moisturizing cream with Retinal. If you happen to have body barnacles this product will help remove them without the doctor zapping you with CO2. Doesn't get the big ones but holds down the small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cabito

customer_reviews.title: WOW... IT WORKS...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I have just started using it and my saggy facial skin feels and looks firmer already. II love the effect of it on my hands and neck too. TMI: I've been using on my butt cheeks as well and loving the results.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Tioran

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy for people who might want to use a mild retinol product on the décolleté.
customer_reviews.text: Huge size Retinol cream for an excellent price point. It does not have the highest percentage of retinol, but this is a very good buy for people who might want to use a mild retinol product on the décolleté.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cream because I have thin skin on my forearms and bruise easily. This lotion help heal my existing bruises. I also am using it on my face and my skin and this cream has improved my complexion better than anything I have ever used before, even expensive creams. I would highly recommend this to everyone. Not greasy either
customer_reviews.author: V. Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Actually gives my dark skin tone a glow. This is my second purchase. After using the 1st one for a few weeks, saw the double one on sale. Grabbed it! Didn't know if the price would rise again. Now covered for a long time. To me most moisturizers do a well enough job. I'll keep using this one because of the added glow!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Scent free!
customer_reviews.text: I am 53 years old, and have dry skin. It is not a thick, heavy moisturizer. Within the first week of use, I noticed that my face and neck looked firmer and my skin tone had improved. I had a couple of tiny breakouts shortly after I first used it, likely due to my skin adjusting to the Retinol. I expect the jar to last me five to six months, and I will definitely purchase it again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: MARNI STRIKS

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best retinol product and you get sooo much for a amazing price! Leaves my skin super moisturized and helping prevent new wrinkles. I use this every night as my moisturizer and I love it. And the pump makes it super easy to use. Will always buy this !
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: okay lotion
customer_reviews.text: I used to use St.ives renewing face lotion, but I wanted to find another one since the old one has changed the ingredients. I was this one have numerous good review, so I think I will give it a try. First thing, this is a huge jar for face lotion, but the smell is way chemical for me. I did use it for 2 weeks now. At the first few days, my face has reacted to this and i had pimples. But now, I think everything is ok, just except for the smell. I do not like the smell at all. So I use it not only for face, but also neck hands, legs,... lol
customer_reviews.author: Erik P

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am older, I use other products for my face so I cannot say how it works for that. I can say, I have been using this product on my chest, arms, legs and butt. I have definitely seen improvement in skin tone and my skin stays soft all day. This is a reasonably priced product that I will definitely continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this product for 3 weeks and literally it’s a joke. It only works when you put it for a few hours and then when you shower each day It come off. I’m 35 Years old and I’m preventing creepy skin, but this is not the hype as everyone seems to make it. By the end of my 8hr shift my skin is super dry. Again, it’s works for a few hours but not long term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pump doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this product, I’d seen many of the reviews said that the pump on the jar’s lid didn’t work. I hoped that this was a transient issue and wouldn’t affect my purchase. It does, neither of the jar pumps work and because of this, I don’t use it very often. When I do take the time to unscrew the lid and dip in, I like the way the lotion feels on my skin and feel the firming action on my face and neck when I wake up in the morning but because it’s a pain to access. I really don’t use it all that much.
customer_reviews.author: F. Krafft

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years after my wife TOLD me to take better care of my skin. Our daughter was home for Christmas, and we were playing games when she stopped and said "your skin looks really good, dad." Showed her what I was using, and made this purchase so I can share a jar with her.
customer_reviews.author: Raul R. Estela

customer_reviews.title: For my wife
customer_reviews.text: This lotion was recommended to my wife by her dermatologist. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wendel

customer_reviews.title: Good cream
customer_reviews.text: This is very good "stuff". It does as well if not better than a much higher priced brand that I've used in the past. This is my second purchase. I don't repurchase if I'm not pleased!
customer_reviews.author: lddpm5

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: When will I learn to stop reading these paid reviews for products? While there was nothing wrong with this moisturizer, it certainly wasn’t any better or worse than something from a drug store. No visible difference after several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does wonders for my skin. My only complaint was the container it arrives in as the pump was broken. I luckily had another container I could fit it all and it's fine. Otherwise it's a really good product moisturize is pretty well and I'm noticing last lines on my face it's just the packaging that need to be worked on.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sakura

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This cream arrived on time and in perfect condition. I really like the product much better than I thought. It is creamy, not sticky. It absorbs quickly yet spreads quickly and easily. I would definitely reorder this when I run out. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Conniedgl

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: product is potent. gets rid of dry skin. even skin tone, smooths skin and minimizes wrinkles, give a health non oily look all in one use. and even better after further use..
customer_reviews.author: TScott

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The best value ever for a retinol lotion! I use on my face, neck, chest and hands. Makes my skin glow. Because I have so much due to the large quantity in the bottle, I feel like I can use it without guilt because I’ve gotten such a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery & Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am 75 years young and have tried countless products over the years. I have found with cleansing my face thoroughly, applying a firming serum and then this cream, my face feels soft and without any heavy feel. Am using this instead of many high-priced products I have accumulated.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Trobaugh

customer_reviews.title: No better than Aveeno
customer_reviews.text: I did a test comparing this product to the Dollar General brand of Aveeno. I put this brand on one arm and DG version of Aveeno on the other. After 3 weeks nobody could tell the difference. Once I run out of this I will continue to purchase from Dollar General. This stuff does feel thicker, it just doesn't make my arms or face look any less wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Tracie Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this product...Using on my upper arms and neck...it appears to be working better than I expected so I ordered a second jar. Good size, affordable and fragrance free is a real plus for me. Worth a try for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Think Carefully - Not a great skin cream
customer_reviews.text: This skin cream is watery and smells like a combination of cinnamon and the soap Catholic schools used to clean bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Broken dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how great or not great this works yet as I haven’t had it long enough. But I do not like that I can’t contact the buyer. One of the duo I purchased had a broken dispenser and if already given the other one away to my sister in law. I can’t very well ask for her item back just to complete a return. I guess I’ll just have to open the container with each use. If it works great, I’ll come back and revise my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie S

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this product would be a good moisturizer and keep my skin more youthful. I find it to be very drying to my skin. No scent at all, which is fine. When used on my arms or legs it made my skin scaly so I didn’t try it anywhere else. My skin is very sensitive, especially on my face, so did not continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: whateverland

customer_reviews.title: Smooths dry skin immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I love the huge size and use it on my old legs and arms, along with the hydrologic formula. I swear my skin is less crinkley in less the a weeks use. Glad I bought the combination set, and bought 2 of those, for a total of 4 big tubs. There is no scent that I can detect
customer_reviews.author: HELPIE

customer_reviews.title: Product came with the lid popped off. I screwed ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came with the lid popped off. I screwed it back on and the pump does not work. Thankfully the product itself was contained somehow so there was no loss. Just stuck with unscrewing the lid everyday. Producted itself seems good
customer_reviews.author: Sue Westfall

customer_reviews.title: Light, yet retinol rich night cream
customer_reviews.text: This retinol cream doesn't burn as some do. I use it every night at bedtime to moisturize my face, neck, and my freckly arms. Over time it fades dark spots. Although I am 67, I don't have any wrinkles yet, but I do show the effects of gravity. I wake up with my face looking uplifted. (I do not use it during the day if I am going to be in the sun as retinol and sunshine are not a good mix.)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mobley

customer_reviews.title: ... my face -- having the pump is so much better than having to squeeze a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I use it nightly on my face -- having the pump is so much better than having to squeeze a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is fantastic! I have been using it about 1 month and now and I've noticed the lines on my chest I've already disappeared. I use it on my face and it really moisturizes as the red dry skin it's gone instantly. I have used many creams over the years that cost exceedingly more but this one by far has shown the best results. I love the fact that containers are so large and the pumps are fantastic :-) I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Offer your skin a youthful experience
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. I have purchased it a couple of times. It’s very moisturizing on my skin. I really like the way it’s packaged with the pump. I like the way my skin reacts with it. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff...it's quite moisturizing. However, I question just how much Retinol is in the mostiurizer.
customer_reviews.author: Donny M.

customer_reviews.title: Retinol Cream Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of years and my skin looks remarkable for a 75 year old man. It is smooth, has no visible pores and few wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: This cream really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a couple of years ago and I love it. My skin is very soft and it is smoothing out my wrinkles. I started putting it on my arms about 6 minths ago. I figured if it was helping my face it should wirk on my arms and it is. Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size containers for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the jars for the price. However, the advertisement indicates the cream is for your body as well as your face, but the directions do not include body, which is why I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of quality lotion in user-friendly container.
customer_reviews.text: The lotion was great; but definitely appreciated the sturdy container that can be used one-handed & plan to refill. (Bought 3 different formulas of lotion.) Used one for dog shampoo (when it was emptied) so I can suds the pup up one handed! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product two days ago, so I’m not sure how it works yet. However, the pump does not work at all. I have to open it up to use it. My hands are arthritic, and the pump would help. I’d be happy to update this after I use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Menard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. I felt my skin smoother the next morning after applying at night for the first time! It is very good quality and it doesn't smell strong. It's hard to find a product that I don't have allergies and this one is also good because I don't have allergies. I'm happy with the purchase! It really worths it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana N-Lautner

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs nicely and leaves your skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of product for the price. It has a very light scent that dissipates quickly. Absorbs nicely and leaves your skin so soft, but not at all greasy.
customer_reviews.author: sheila .J

customer_reviews.title: seems to be getting some results
customer_reviews.text: I just received this a few days ago. I use it morning and night. So far I have noticed the feel of tightening of the skin around my mouth, which is one of my targeted areas. But nothing quite visual yet. It's still early an fi will continue with this regime.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this daily on torso, upper arms & thighs. Along with exercise & healthier eating, plan to be able to rock the bikini again this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Anne J. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a difference in my wrinkles and for an excellent price. One caveat, use it only when you won't be in the sun. Retinal and sun do NOT go well together.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very surprised at the size of the container for the price. Definitely recommend this item and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Removed wrinkles on my hands neck basically my whole body. UPDATE - arrived Nov 4 today is Nov 23, I AM AMAZED! No longer using those pre makeup smoothing serums, no longer using 'full face' makeup. I do use concealer and simply sponge blend. And, my skin has this glow!
customer_reviews.author: Jix Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Light, non greasy moisturizing wrinkle cream. Must say definitely works. Absorbs rather fast so can apply makeup with no major delays. I do not wear any type of foundation so not sure how it is over this cream, but cream is not greasy so hopefully works well. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Green-eyed girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my dermatologist. It has really made a difference. I use all over the body before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: great addition to an acne routine
customer_reviews.text: great addition to an acne routine. I do face wash, toner, this, bp, and tea tree oil and it has really helped. i have seen great results in a month
customer_reviews.author: Samina Ali

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT...you get lots and it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: It is big , so I can use on my body too. I love it!! I had to buy my daughter one. I also bough Vitamin C cream. I'll be buying others from the same maker.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin was starting to show individual cells. Even Gold Bond didn't work.. The individual cell look is gone!
customer_reviews.author: baptis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: There is obviously something in your formula that causes my eyes some discomfort so I need to avoid eye area. I mixed this product with other products that I always add to face cream. Seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Psycprof

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! After the first day, this is noticeably effective. You won’t be let down. Face feels firm and tight. This is very light-weight, not at all greasy.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Evens out skin tone
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this about a month, but noticed almost immediately my skin became less red in areas and looked more even. I can't attest to looking younger, but for the price it's certainly worth it for a minimum of a good moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: goes on smoothly but leaves a somewhat sticky residue on hand and face
customer_reviews.text: goes on smoothly but leaves a somewhat sticky residue on hand and face , but it absorbs quickly into the skin. my only complaint is not the cream, but the pump is stuck and i cant get it to pump, i need to open the whole jar to use it,great buy for the price . i just received this a day ago, so i cant say how well it works at reducing wrinkles, but it is a good buy,
customer_reviews.author: Jeri cullinan

customer_reviews.title: An ok value
customer_reviews.text: No major difference bit a good face non greasy face cream.
customer_reviews.author: Value Skr

customer_reviews.title: Looking younger every day
customer_reviews.text: Live rhis product! Does exactly what it says. My skin looks and feels fabulous! The fine lones in my dorgead and upper lip have siminished as well! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The Retinol cream I usually buy has been out of stock for quite awhile so I figured I'd give this one a try. It's not as thick, but seems to work just as well as the other and the price is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Boogiegirl

customer_reviews.title: This does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for moisturizer and firming of body. Saw a difference in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy2

customer_reviews.title: Cap broke off & the product isnt pumping out
customer_reviews.text: I just received my product. Opened the bottle and the cap broke off. Im pumping and pumping and NOTHING is coming out. I even opened the bottle repositioned the stem and norhing. Very bad first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like how it moisturizes my hands and it lasts. The scent is pleasant, not loud. I have had results as yet because I just started using the product but I'm hoping it's helpful to reducing wrinkles in my hands which I the main reason for this purchase. I will definitely write another review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya d

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work okay
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it off and on and I haven't really noticed it taking away any wrinkles. The reason I haven't used it everyday is because it seems to be making me break out. Maybe my skin just has to get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: well priced if it's the real thing inside
customer_reviews.text: Like many others stated the pump was loose and product had come out. I'm not entirely convinced the tub wasn't refilled with an inferior product. Scentless lotion that does not absorb easily. Can't say yes or not to results for wrinkles as I usually combine with other products. I use on crepey arms too since there is so much.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA GALBRAITH

customer_reviews.title: not greasy
customer_reviews.text: im not sure if it works but i use it everyday night. my pores look better but I dont know if its just my mind telling me eyes. for the price and its not greasy and i havent broken out with pimples, its good. I know I seen at salons so it cant be that bad
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Sceptic to believer.
customer_reviews.text: I actually notice a difference after three weeks. Not just blowing smoke either. The crepeness is reducing slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Handygal

customer_reviews.title: Great results at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: I use Rodan and Fields on my face and these products on my neck and hands. Can't see much difference in the two brands. (except the price!)
customer_reviews.author: sheri packett

customer_reviews.title: Product good, packaging a mess
customer_reviews.text: I did receive my product fast and it works well. It didn’t come with a pump attached so I have to unscrew the lid every time I use it. Plus the bottle was cracked but I taped it. I wish it was packaged better. But I use it on my face, neck, and arms and it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tira Kelker Mason

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: When i opened the box and the 2 creams; one of the creams was leaking due to a flimsy pump lid. Cream oozed from the defective lid and made quite a mess on the floor. Caution: open gently.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A Northcraft

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I feel that kin on my legs definitely appears firmer and feels really smooth. I would and probably will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Heals and tone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I had rough skin due to diabetes and my skin is improving everyday. I am also see slight toning week by week. I also use it on my clients and their skin after certain treatments and they are noticing changes in their skin. I recommend adding to daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have dry patches and this cream is very rich , so it helped with that. It has no scent to it. Mine came with 2 large jars . I love that I dont have to order some for a long time. The pump is very also useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body cream from face to ankles. Will be purchasing again and again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Us from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I mix this product with other products in this line......always amazing results......practically overnight......I am 64 years old....I’ve never been disappointed.....this line is very cool! Try it ♥️
customer_reviews.author: carol strand

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Like many posters here the jar pump did not open so I transferred cream to another container. I am satisfied with the cream. I use for a after shower body cream. The cream is lite and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for night treatment
customer_reviews.text: I really am surprised & impressed at the large amount and how moisturizing it really is. I usually like scents but can easily overlook that it's not scented due to the results.
customer_reviews.author: KallyfromCali

customer_reviews.title: It absorbs fast and doesn’t leave skin oily or sticky!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend gave me a bottle of this and when I began running low, I found it on Amazon and ordered it! This is the best product for my skin I’ve ever used! Moisturizing and non greasy and feels great on your body any time of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lucido

customer_reviews.title: I will returned it. I will try another product ...
customer_reviews.text: I will returned it. I will try another product, I did not use it that long and they say retinol take time to work. I am looking for the quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I found this lotion. I have been using this for a while and really like it. Best lotion I have been able to use for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Second Order
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion. You can wear it under makeup, alone or at night. I notice a difference in my skin the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I have used "retinol for years. This product does exactly what it sayes it will do. I love it. G. Tagtmeier
customer_reviews.author: D.G. Tagtmeier

customer_reviews.title: Retinol Cream
customer_reviews.text: I like this cream for overall body moisturizer right after shower. It is great and goes on smooth. Not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Hopkdiva

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date?
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product so I can't comment on its effectiveness, but I'm concerned that it doesn't have an expiration date. Any chemical product which has that many ingredients is bound to interact or lose potency at some point. I see a lot number, but it should also have a reasonable "use by", "sell by" or an actual expiration date, especially since it's a large size and it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Szende

customer_reviews.title: wife says its great !!!
customer_reviews.text: bought for wife , shes very happy with it , really likes the pump jar ... will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to get my order in a timely fashion during the pandemic. Included in the order was a surprise gift of hyaluronic gel cream. The cream is wonderful and the gift was an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes very well. I use on chest, face and hands and after about a week I noticed a difference in fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Rent in
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok...nothing special about it...the retinal that is in this product is waaayy down the list of their ingredients....which means, don't hold your breath to see results any time soon or ever... Ann
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: You get alot for the money. Non-irtitating, little scent. I buy this for friends. Use a little on DRY skin.
customer_reviews.author: TToka

customer_reviews.title: See improvement within days
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this daily since it arrived,, and I can already see a difference in my skin! (2 weeks) glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't suggest it
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin don't get this product. It made my skin turn red and it really irritated my skin. Wish I could get a refund on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Theo Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Very Clean Feeling, no greasy feeling to it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because the price was phenomenal. But, I'm really impressed with this product! Has a very clean feeling, moisturizes immediately and my foundation doesn't matte up with it. I love it!! Thanks so much!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I tried this product and used on my face and body. I found it didn't do anything at all. I have used it for 2 months now
customer_reviews.author: angela thompson

customer_reviews.title: This cream is such a good deal but I wish it were thicker and more ...
customer_reviews.text: This cream is such a good deal but I wish it were thicker and more moisturizing. Retinol creams should always be used at night, but this cream doesn't hold up to other night creams.
customer_reviews.author: rdejmal

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: This product is eh. I didnt see any difference at all in my appearance and i was difficult to rub it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

product_meta.title: Advanced Clinicals Retinol Cream. Spa Size for Salon Professionals. Moisturizing Formula Penetrates Skin to Erase the Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles. Fragrance Free. (16oz)
feature_bullets: #1 CLINICALLY PROVEN ANTI-AGING INGREDIENT Retinol is considered to be the #1 Dermatologist recommended skin care ingredient. It is known to diminish the look of deep wrinkles, fine lines and sun damage while boosting collagen production to help with firming. First formulated for use after cosmetic procedures, this cream is now available for anyone who wants to renew his or her skin.

HYDRATING AND NOURISHING Anti-aging cream with Hyaluronic Acid hydrates and plumps your skin for a healthier, fuller, and younger appearance. Replenish moisture with a bit of help from Aloe Vera and Chamomile. Nourish your skin while improving your skins elasticity all at once. Combination of ingredients make this retinol cream non-irritating like many other retinol products.

EFFECTIVE ANTI-AGING INGREDIENTS Visibly restore volume to areas prone to sagging and wrinkles. Aloe Vera defends against visible redness and irritation. Green Tea and Chamomile guards against environmental damage and reduces puffiness. Promote a more youthful look and show off a more radiant skin by breaking up the look of sun damage and wrinkles.

LARGE SPA SIZE VALUE PACK SET OF TWO- Most retinol creams or other retinol products come in .5oz or 1oz jars that only last you a short time. This retinol cream comes in a 16oz Spa size jar with a convenient to use pump. Large enough cream to be used a body moisturizer or body lotion, but gentle and effective to remove the appearance of unwanted wrinkles on your face, neck, decollete, and under your eyes.
Paraben-free. Trusted formula. Manufactured in the USA. Not tested on animals. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
